bug.author: nlin5
bug.summary: FileNotFoundError when trying to save GUI annotations started from command line
bug.description:
Error Trackback: Traceback (most recent call last): File "labelme/app.py", line 1326, in saveFile File "labelme/app.py", line 1369, in _saveFile File "labelme/app.py", line 930, in saveLabels File "os.py", line 220, in makedirs FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '' Abort trap: 6 Command Line Code: labelme my_file.png -O myfile.json Situation: The above command line code opens up the Labelme GUI and I am able to create polygons to annotate segments of my image. However, when I click "Save", Labelme closes and I get the above error traceback. Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: MacOS Catalina Labelme Version: 3.6.10

comments.comment: I can't reproduce. <denchmark-code>cd examples/tutorial rm -rf *json labelme apc2016_obj3.jpg -O apc2016_obj3.json # it exits with no error </denchmark-code>
